verses.verse: Now it happened after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>' servant, <S%H8334><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> is dead; <S%H4191><s%> now therefore arise, <S%H6965><s%> go over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> you, <S%H5971><s%> and all this people, to the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> to them, <S%H1121><s%> even to the children of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
I have given <S%H5414><s%> you every place <S%H4725><s%> that the sole <S%H3709><s%> of your foot <S%H7272><s%> will tread on, <S%H1869><s%> as I told <S%H1696><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

From the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and this Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> even to the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates, <S%H6578><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and to the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> toward the going down <S%H3996><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> shall be your border. <S%H1366><s%>

No man <S%H376><s%> will be able to stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life. <S%H2416><s%> As I was with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so I will be with you. <S%H7503><s%> I will not fail you nor forsake you. <S%H5800><s%>

"Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous; <S%H553><s%> for you shall cause this people <S%H5971><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give them. <S%H5414><s%>

Only be strong <S%H2388><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> courageous, <S%H553><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all the law, <S%H8451><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you. <S%H5493><s%> Don't turn from it to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left, <S%H8040><s%> that you may have good success <S%H7919><s%> wherever you go. <S%H3212><s%>

This book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> shall not depart <S%H4185><s%> out of your mouth, <S%H6310><s%> but you shall meditate <S%H1897><s%> on it day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> that you may observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> therein: <S%H6743><s%> for then you shall make your way <S%H1870><s%> prosperous, <S%H6743><s%> and then you shall have good success. <S%H7919><s%>

Haven't <S%H6680><s%> I commanded you? <S%H2388><s%> Be strong and courageous. <S%H553><s%> Don't <S%H6206><s%> be afraid, neither be dismayed: <S%H2865><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is with you wherever you go. <S%H3212><s%>"
Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the midst of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and command <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3559><s%> 'Prepare food; <S%H6720><s%> for within three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you are to pass over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>'"

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> gives you rest, <S%H5117><s%> and will give <S%H5414><s%> you this land. <S%H776><s%>

Your wives, <S%H802><s%> your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and your livestock, <S%H4735><s%> shall live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> but you shall pass <S%H5674><s%> over before <S%H6440><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> armed, <S%H2571><s%> all the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valor, <S%H2428><s%> and shall help them <S%H5826><s%>

until Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5117><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> rest, <S%H5117><s%> as he has given <S%H5117><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and they have also possessed the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> them. <S%H7725><s%> Then you shall return to the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession, <S%H3425><s%> and possess it, <S%H4872><s%> which Moses the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrise. <S%H4217><s%>'"

They answered <S%H6030><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "All that you have commanded <S%H6680><s%> us we will do, <S%H6213><s%> and wherever <S%H834><s%> you send <S%H7971><s%> us we will go. <S%H3212><s%>

Just as we listened <S%H8085><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in all things, <S%H8085><s%> so will we listen to you. <S%H3068><s%> Only may Yahweh your God <S%H430><s%> be with you, <S%H4872><s%> as he was with Moses.

Whoever <S%H376><s%> rebels <S%H4784><s%> against your commandment, <S%H6310><s%> and doesn't <S%H8085><s%> listen to your words <S%H1697><s%> in all that you command <S%H6680><s%> him, <S%H4191><s%> he shall be put to death. Only be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous. <S%H553><s%>"
